Spacewar

A classic space combat game where two players battle in a gravity field LAUNCH SPACEWAR

Instructions

  1. Click the LAUNCH button above to start the game
  2. Use keyboard controls:
    • Arrow keys for movement
    • Space to fire
    • ESC to exit
    • Alt+Enter for fullscreen
